radiographic_examinations.findings: Paraspinal mass in the right lower thorax.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: The paraspinal mass was unchanged on repeat chest radiograph done two months later.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Clear lung fields; the paraspinal mass was unchanged.

Well-marginated paraspinal mass (3 cm by 5 cm by 5 cm) on the right, extending from the T9 vertebral body to T11. No extension into or widening of the neural foramina; no expansion or cortical erosion of ribs or vertebral bodies. Additional masses (1.2 cm and 1.0 cm) adjacent to the right posterior eighth rib and left posterior ninth rib.

Paraspinal mass (3 cm by 5 cm) on the right, extending from T9 to T11, with heterogeneous pattern and mild enhancement. No effect on the neural foramina; no expansion of the ribs or vertebral bodies; no evidence of signal suppression on fat-suppressed sequences.
